title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 28.3 - Arbitration commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 28.3 - Arbitration commissioner

State Regulations
(a) The Chief Administrator shall
designate, in each county where arbitration is established pursuant to this

Part, an arbitration commissioner. The compensation, if any, payable to a
commissioner, other than a full-time public official or employee who shall
receive no compensation as such commissioner, shall be determined by the Chief

Administrator within the appropriation made available for that
purpose. (b) The
commissioner shall maintain complete and current records of all cases subject
to arbitration under this Part and a current list of attorneys consenting to
act as arbitrators. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
28.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
